resources.string: We are one of the global leaders in the elevator and escalator industry. Founded in 2013, we have been committed to understanding the needs of our customers for over a century. We provide innovative and eco-efficient solutions for elevators, escalators and automatic building doors. Our objective is to offer the best People FlowÂ® experience by developing and delivering solutions that enable people to move smoothly, safely, comfortably and without waiting in buildings in an increasingly urbanizing environment.
